location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP 19 MAP TO ILLUSTRATE OPERATIONS BETWEEN 10TH. MARCH & END OF APRIL 1916.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 191 x 300mm, on sheet 268 x 355mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume II, and shows a region around the Dujaila watercourse [Nahr ad Dujaylah] in central and eastern Iraq, indicating military operations, towns, settlements, rivers and marshes.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in 1924.
